full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM GYI BSNYEN PA BYA TSUL SBYIN SREG DANG BCAS PAS BEE d'U RYA'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM LHAN CIG TU SGRUB TSUL SBYIN SREG DANG BCAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES AOR DU SU NAS AE'U SHING PE'I ZI PO YAN THAS KYI LHA KHANG GI BLA MA GZHUNG BRGYA SMRA BA MKHAN POR RAB 'BYAMS BLO BZANG RDO RJES DNGUL GYI MAndAL LHA DAR DANG BCAS NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, RIG PA 'DZIN PA ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS ME LUG LHA BABS KYI DUS CHEN NYIN LEGS BSHAD SGRIGS PA'I, DGA' TSAL DU CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLIND DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS SO,, ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN GRUB SHOG , ,,)
